description:
Advocating For The Injured And Disabled Throughout Central Florida

Do you live in Central Florida and have a debilitating injury that prevents you from working? Did you suffer an injury or lose a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing or are you a disabled veteran fighting with the Veterans Administration over your rightful benefits?

If so, you need a dedicated attorney on your side to help you obtain the Social Security Disability benefits and other compensation you deserve.

The attorneys at Avard Law Offices, P.A., in Orlando, Florida, have decades of experience handling SSDI claims as well as all types of personal injury, wrongful death, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse claims.

Serving The Region Since 1989

Founded in 1989, the law firm has become the trusted source for high-quality, effective advocacy for those in need. With eight offices located throughout Central and Southwestern Florida, the firm offers convenient access to top-notch legal counsel for residents across the region. They also offer services in Spanish, French, Russian and Ukrainian to provide an even higher level of support to those who struggle to speak English.

Work With An Experienced Attorney Who Cares

With two attorneys certified by the National Board of Trial Advocacy in Social Security Disability, you can rest easy knowing your case is in the best hands possible. Working closely with you, the firm's lawyers strive to fully understand your situation so that they can devise the strongest case possible on your behalf.

If you have a legal need related to Social Security Disability or any type of claim of negligence, you can contact Avard Law Offices, P.A., to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
